sources.title: Sacred Cargo | FULL MOVIE | Action, Thriller, Espionage
sources.description:
Vince Kanevsky is a US Marine who finds out that his brother has been kidnapped by ruthless ex KGB members, he will stop at nothing to find what really happened.

Chris Penn; Vince Kanevsky, J.T Walsh; Father Stanislav, Anna Karin; Sasha Romanov, Luiza Mosendz; Marina, Martin Sheen; Father Andrew Kanvesky

Directed by Aleksandr Buravskiy
1995
